title: PM Shehbaz to address nation amid Pak-India escalation - DAWN.COM
content:
Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif will address the nation at 9:30pm amid the recent escalation in tensions between Pakistan and India, according to a statement from the Prime Minister’s Office.

Speaking in the National Assembly earlier today, he called on all political leaders to come and sit together to make Pakistan a “united nation”.
